channel.title: Jail on Salvatore Abello's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jail on Salvatore Abello's Blog

item.title: resruby - CyberSpace CTF 2024
item.description: I partecipated to the first edition of CyberSpace CTF with @TheRomanXpl0it. It’s always nice to see some jail challenges so, I decided to write a writeup for the challenge I liked the most. Index Overview Source Building strings from scratch Reading and leaking the flag Solve Flag Considerations Overview Since this category was in the jail category, it can be deduced that it requires executing arbitrary code while bypassing some checks/restrictions.
